**Usage**
============

**Email**
[code language="python"]

from PyBusiness import email

[/code]

**Syntax**

[code language="python"]

email(your_address, addressee, your_passwd, subject_of_email, message)

[/code]

**Example**

[code language="python"]

email("johndoe@whatever.com", "friend@whatever.com", "password", "Greetings", "Hello")

[/code]

-------------
